content: All current passwords will be reset. {{productName}} users will get an email with the access restoration link.

comment.text: This translation key displays a warning message informing users that their current passwords will be reset and provides an email link to restore access. It is used in UI elements where standalone or backup restore operations are initiated, such as settings pages or backup lists.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "سيتم إعادة تعيين جميع كلمات السر الحالية" is a literal translation and sounds slightly unnatural in Arabic. A more natural phrasing would be "سيتم إعادة تعيين جميع كلمات المرور الحالية." (using "كلمات المرور" instead of "كلمات السر").
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: سيتم إعادة تعيين جميع كلمات المرور الحالية.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation 'سوف يتلقى مستخدمي {{productName}} بريد يحتوي على رابط لاستعادة الوصول' is technically correct but a bit verbose. A more concise and natural phrasing would be 'سيحصل مستخدمو {{productName}} على بريد إلكتروني يحتوي على رابط استعادة الوصول.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: سيحصل مستخدمو {{productName}} على بريد إلكتروني يحتوي على رابط استعادة الوصول.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "girişi bərpa etmək üçün keçidi olan e-məktub alacaqlar" could be more accurately translated. It literally translates to 'will receive an email with a link to restore access'. A more natural phrasing would be 'girişləri bərpa etmək üçün keçid olan e-məktub alacaqlar' or 'girişləri yenidən qəbul etmək üçün keçid olan e-məktub alacaqlar'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: girişləri bərpa etmək üçün keçid olan e-məktub alacaqlar

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'restore' is translated as 'obnovení' which implies a process of rebuilding or bringing something back to a previous state. 'Obnovení přístupu' is a bit clunky. A more natural translation for 'restore' in this context would be 'návratu' or simply 'přístupu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Všechna stávající hesla budou resetována. Uživatelé {{productName}} obdrží e-mail s odkazem na návratu přístupu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Wiederherstellung des Zugangs" is a bit literal and formal. A more natural and user-friendly phrasing would be "Zugriffs wiederherstellen" or "Zugang wiederherstellen".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Alle aktuellen Passwörter werden zurückgesetzt. {{productName}}-Benutzer erhalten eine E-Mail mit dem Link, um den Zugang wiederherzustellen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Greek translation lacks the double curly braces used for the product name placeholder, as present in the English version.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change "Οι χρήστες του {{productName}} θα λάβουν ένα μήνυμα email με τον σύνδεσμο επαναφοράς της πρόσβασης." to "Οι χρήστες του {{productName}} θα λάβουν ένα μήνυμα email με τον σύνδεσμο επαναφοράς της πρόσβασης."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'access restoration link' is not the most natural Finnish equivalent for 'restoration link' in this context. A more fluent translation would be something along the lines of 'palautuslinkin'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kaikki nykyiset salasanat nollataan. {{productName}}-käyttäjät saavat sähköpostin, jossa on palautuslinkin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "վերականգնման" (verakanqnaman) is technically correct but sounds slightly awkward in this context. A more natural phrasing might be "վերականգնման հղումով" (verakanqnaman hghumov).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to "Մուտքի վերականգնման հղումով" (Mutqi verakanqnaman hghumov).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence structure feels slightly stiff. The use of a colon after "վերականգնվեն" creates a somewhat abrupt transition.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring the sentence to flow more naturally. For example: "Բոլոր ընթացիկ գաղտնաբառերը կզրոյացվեն, և {{productName}}-ի օգտատերերը նամակ կստանան մուտքի վերականգնման հղումով:" (Bolor entacyq gathn’abare’r kzroyacven, yev {{productName}}-i ogtaterer n'amak kst'anan mutqi verakanqnaman hghumov)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "アクセス回復リンクが記載されたメールが送信されます" is a bit formal and verbose for a warning message. A more natural and user-friendly translation would be something like "アクセス復旧リンクの記載されたメールが送信されます" or simply "アクセス復旧リンクが記載されたメールをお送りします".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: アクセス復旧リンクの記載されたメールをお送りします

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'access restoration link' is a literal translation and might sound unnatural in Korean. A more natural phrasing would focus on retrieving access.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 현재 비밀번호가 모두 재설정됩니다. {{productName}} 사용자는 비밀번호 복구 링크가 포함된 이메일을 받게 됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the sentence structure could be slightly improved for better flow in Korean. Splitting into two shorter sentences can improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 현재 비밀번호가 모두 재설정됩니다. {{productName}} 사용자는 액세스 복원 링크가 포함된 이메일을 받으실 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ຣີເຊັດ' is a transliteration and not a standard Lao word for 'reset'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປັບປ່ຽນເປັນ 'ຣີເຊັດ' ທີ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ ຫຼືໃຊ້ຄໍາທີ່ໝາຍຄວາມເຫມືອນກັນໃນພາສາລາວຢ່າງເປັນທາງການເຊັ່ນ 'ສືບສຸມຄືນ' ຫຼື 'ຄືນສູ່ສະພາບเดิม'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ມີການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ການຟື້ນຟູການເຂົ້າເຖິງ' is a bit verbose. It can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປ່ຽນເປັນ 'ມີການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ສືບສຸມການເຂົ້າໃຊ້' ຫຼື 'ມີການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ຟື້ນຟູການເຂົ້າໃຊ້'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation includes 'odzyskanie dostępu' which translates to 'access recovery'. While accurate, it's slightly more formal than the English 'access restoration'. Consider a more direct and user-friendly translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wszystkie bieżące hasła zostaną zresetowane. Użytkownicy {{productName}} otrzymają wiadomość e-mail z linkiem do ponownego uzyskania dostępu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'spațiului' (meaning 'of the space') sounds unnatural and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of '{{productName}} users'. A more natural translation would imply users *of* the product.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilizatorii {{productName}} vor primi prin email un mesaj cu link-ul pentru restaurarea accesului.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "access restoration link" is a bit literal and might not be the most natural way to express it in Russian. A more fluent translation might use a verb implying regaining access.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Пользователи {{productName}} получат электронное письмо с инструкциями по восстановлению доступа.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "සියලු" (siyallu) is spelled correctly, but it's better to use "සියළුම" (siyalum) for better flow and naturalness in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සියළුම

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ප්‍රවේශය නැවත ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා වූ සබැඳිය සහිත විද්‍යුත් ලිපි ලැබේ" could be more naturally phrased.  The structure feels a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ප්‍රවේශය නැවත ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා වූ සබැඳිය සහිත විද්‍යුත් ලිපිය ලැබේ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the Sinhala translation doesn't convey the urgency or importance of the warning as effectively as the English original. It lacks a sense of action or consequence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සියලු વર્తમાන මුරපదයන් නැවත සකසනු ලැබේ. {{productName}} පරිශීලකයින්ට ප්‍රවේශය නැවත ලබා ගැනීම සඳහා වූ සබැඳිය සහිත විද්‍යුත් ලිපිය ලැබේ.  මෙයට හේතුව පරිශීලකයින්ගේ ආරක්ෂාව සඳහා වන අතර, මෙය අවශ්‍යයි.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'resetovane' is not the most natural or accurate translation for 'reset' in this context. While technically correct, it sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Све тренутне лозинке биће враћене на почетне вредности.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation maintains the same formatting as the English (using double curly braces for {{productName}}). This is good, but double-check to ensure this is the standard for the platform/system using the translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed, but verify consistency with platform standards.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses 'pristupom linku za obnovu' which is a bit verbose. A more natural phrasing would be 'linkom za obnovu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sve trenutne lozinke će biti resetovane. {{productName}} korisnici će dobiti email sa linkom za obnovu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'restore access' is not the most natural way to express 'restoration link' in Vietnamese. A more accurate translation would be 'liên kết để lấy lại quyền truy cập' or 'liên kết khôi phục quyền truy cập'. While 'khôi phục quyền truy cập' is acceptable, it might sound slightly formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Người dùng {{productName}} sẽ nhận được một email có liên kết để lấy lại quyền truy cập.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'All current passwords will be reset' could be more naturally translated as '所有密码都将被重置' instead of '所有当前密码都将被重置'. While technically correct, the addition of '当前' (current) is slightly redundant and sounds less fluent in Chinese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 所有密码都将被重置。
